name: Pimpersock's Polymorphin' Potion
description:
Picture it...

The rain drumming along your cozy cottage roof...

The fire ablaze in the hearth beside you...

Finally, a day for yourself...

Until the local Princess barges in, asking for your help...

What will you do, Granny Pimpersock?

A short VN for the O2A2A jam!

The characters in the game are fully voiced!

This game has 3 short and distinct endings!
